semantic_identifier: [GOLD-12]: Add data sufficiency diagnostics (sample size + coverage) to fit score output
title: Add data sufficiency diagnostics (sample size + coverage) to fit score output

sections.text: Implement backend diagnostics that compute sample size, recency, and key-signal coverage for each segment used in fit score generation. Attach these diagnostics to the fit score response so the UI can display a clear “limited data” warning when thresholds aren’t met. Include configurable thresholds and basic logging to track how often outputs are generated under low-data conditions.
